trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.
trans-unit.target: 表示列印系統硬體或軟體元件的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 屬性 (及其值)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this class while installing a second printer whose properties differ from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何安裝第二個印表機，其屬性都與從現有印表機只位置、 連接埠，以及共用的狀態時使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> attribute that the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 所表示 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> class for the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體，使其具有指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Boolean> property of a print system object, including casing.
trans-unit.target: `attributeName`拼字應該做為某些特定的名稱完全相同<xref:System.Boolean>列印系統物件，包括大小寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.IsBusy%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "IsBusy", not "Busy" or "Isbusy".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.IsBusy%2A>屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>物件必須拼字"IsBusy"，不 「 忙碌 」 或 「 Isbusy"。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> property that the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 表示之 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property that the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> represents.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> class for the specified property that is using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 類別的新執行個體，使其具有正在使用指定值的指定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Boolean> property of a print system object, including casing.
trans-unit.target: `attributeName`拼字應該做為某些特定的名稱完全相同<xref:System.Boolean>列印系統物件，包括大小寫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.IsBusy%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "IsBusy", not "Busy" or "Isbusy".
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.IsBusy%2A>屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>物件必須拼字"IsBusy"，不 「 忙碌 」 或 「 Isbusy"。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor while installing a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何安裝不同的第二個印表機屬性與現有印表機只位置、 連接埠，以及共用的狀態時使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Provides implicit conversion from a <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> (or from a pointer to such a property) to a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供由 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> (或這類屬性的指標) 至 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 的隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> that is converted.
Provides implicit conversion to a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> from a pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供由指標的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 至 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 的隱含轉換。

trans-unit.source: The converted PrintBooleanProperty object as a Boolean object.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換為布林物件的 PrintBooleanProperty 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the property that the <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty" /> 表示的屬性值。
